caption_text:
🪩SMOKE & MIRRORS🪩

A night of convergence.

The planets have aligned and allowed us to present you a stellar constellation of out-of-this-world DJs, co-ordinated and facilitated by the most passionate and dedicated creatives in the region.

Each of them has travelled far and wide, through wildly different times and spaces, carrying their experiences with them and telling their stories through their art.

On March 30, their paths will all intersect in an abandoned dance studio in Downtown Kitchener. A month later, the studio will be gone.

🔊THE DJS🔊

@danasonic_ 
Local legend and all-around sweetheart. They specialise in sonic journeys, dance floor euphoria, and rhythms for the booties

@dd.friendsnotfoes 
Eclectic, free-flowing, and versatile, D.D. has played with your favourite DJ’s favourite DJ on the other side of the world.

@nothalfnhalf 
A heavyweight producer/performer combo, his electric energy and unique ambition have catapulted him into the spotlight. 

@hvn001314 
On the cutting edge of dance culture and forward-thinking musical expression. Their sets are eccentric, bass-heavy, and expansive.

🤝THE TEAM🤝

A truly special gathering of creative minds, the collective @gro.up.therapy has emerged out of this event as a team dedicated to facilitating the highest quality of live music and dance experiences.

Host & Set Design: @alexhannides 
Graphic Design: @existentialcowgirl 
Light & Stage Design @afrequentsea 
Photography: @its_another_photographer 

We’ve all been putting our heart and souls into the creation and curation of this event. He hope that you decide to join us on this beautiful journey.

Special Thanks to @studiofuzioncommunity for supporting us in using their space!

POSTER DESIGN BY: @existentialcowgirl
